nodes.text: Thaere Runner was a CR90 corvette that served in the Thaereian military during the Clone Wars.

The Runner was used as a customs ship in the Cularin system and when the Heroes of Cularin left Cularin to travel to Druckenwell, they were forced to dock their ship with it. The Thaereian officer Lieutenant Toric Bisilt asked the heroes questions about their intentions, while Corporal Desic Malboan of Thaereian Intelligence attached a tracking device to their ship. The Thaereians then released the heroes and they flew away from the Runner.
